sourcesContent:
<template>
    <router-link to=url class="nav-link fw-bold py-1 px-0" @click="activate" aria-current="page">{{ linkName }}</router-link>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'NavItemComponent',
    props: {
        linkName: String,
        url: String,
    },
    methods: {
        activate(e) {
            let currentLink = window.$(e.target);
            currentLink.siblings(".active").each((e, a) => {
                window.$(a).removeClass("active")
            })
            currentLink.addClass("active")
            this.$emit("go-to", currentLink.data("link-url"))
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
a {
    cursor: pointer;
}
</style>
